verses.verse: A good <WH2896> name <WH8034> is better <WH2896> than <WH4480> a good <WH2896> ointment, <WH8081> And the day <WH3117> of [one's] death <WH4194> is better than <WH4480> the day <WH3117> of one's birth. <WH3205>

It is better <WH2896> to go <WH1980> to a house <WH1004> of mourning <WH60> Than <WH4480> to go <WH1980> to a house <WH1004> of feasting, <WH4960> Because <WH834> that is the end <WH5490> of every <WH3605> man, <WH120> And the living <WH2416> takes <WH5414> [it] to heart. <WH3820>
Sorrow <WH3708> is better <WH2896> than <WH4480> laughter, <WH7814> For when a face <WH6440> is sad <WH7455> a heart <WH3820> may be happy. <WH3190>
The mind <WH3820> of the wise <WH2450> is in the house <WH1004> of mourning, <WH60> While the mind <WH3820> of fools <WH3684> is in the house <WH1004> of pleasure. <WH8057>
It is better <WH2896> to listen <WH8085> to the rebuke <WH1606> of a wise <WH2450> man <WH2450> Than <WH4480> for one <WH376> to listen <WH8085> to the song <WH7892> of fools. <WH3684>

For as the crackling <WH6963> of thorn <WH9359> bushes <WH9359> under <WH8478> a pot, <WH5518> So <WH3651> is the laughter <WH7814> of the fool, <WH3684> And this <WH2088> too <WH1571> is futility. <WH1892>
For oppression <WH6233> makes <WH1984> a wise <WH2450> man <WH2450> mad, <WH1984> And a bribe <WH4979> corrupts the heart. <WH6>

The end <WH319> of a matter <WH1697> is better <WH2896> than <WH4480> its beginning; <WH7225> Patience <WH750> of spirit <WH7307> is better <WH2896> than <WH4480> haughtiness <WH1364> of spirit. <WH7307>
Do not be eager <WH926> in your heart <WH7307> to be angry, <WH3707> For anger <WH3708> resides <WH5117> in the bosom <WH2436> of fools. <WH3684>

Do not say, <WH559> "Why <WH4100> is it that the former <WH7223> days <WH3117> were better <WH2896> than <WH4480> these <WH428>?" For it is not from wisdom <WH2451> that you ask <WH7592> about <WH5921> this. <WH2088>
Wisdom <WH2451> along <WH5973> with an inheritance <WH5159> is good <WH2896> And an advantage <WH3148> to those who see <WH7200> the sun. <WH8121>

For wisdom <WH2451> is protection <WH6738> [just as] money <WH3701> is protection. <WH6738> But the advantage <WH3504> of knowledge <WH1847> is that wisdom <WH2451> preserves <WH2421> the lives <WH2421> of its possessors. <WH1167>
Consider <WH7200> the work <WH4639> of God, <WH430> For who <WH4310> is able <WH3201> to straighten <WH8626> what <WH834> He has bent <WH5791>?

In the day <WH3117> of prosperity <WH9186> be happy, <WH9185> But in the day <WH3117> of adversity <WH9567> consider <WH7200> â€“ God <WH430> has made <WH6213> the one <WH2088> as well <WH5980> as the other <WH2088> So <WH5921> <WH1700> that man <WH120> may not discover <WH4672> anything <WH3972> [that will be] after <WH310> him.

I have seen <WH7200> everything <WH3605> during my lifetime <WH3117> of futility; <WH1892> there <WH3426> is a righteous <WH6662> man <WH6662> who perishes in his righteousness, <WH6> and there <WH6664> is a wicked <WH3426> man <WH7563> who prolongs <WH7563> [his life] in his wickedness. <WH748>
Do not be excessively <WH7235> righteous, <WH6662> and do not be overly <WH3148> wise. <WH2449> Why <WH4100> should you ruin <WH8074> yourself?
Do not be excessively <WH7235> wicked, <WH7561> and do not be a fool. <WH5530> Why <WH4100> should you die <WH4191> before <WH3808> your time <WH6256>?

It is good <WH2896> that you grasp <WH270> one <WH2088> thing, <WH2088> and also <WH1571> not let <WH5117> <WH3027> go <WH5117> <WH3027> of the other; <WH2088> for the one who fears <WH3372> God <WH430> comes <WH3318> forth <WH3318> with both <WH3605> of them.
Wisdom <WH2451> strengthens <WH5810> a wise <WH2450> man <WH2450> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> ten <WH6235> rulers <WH7989> who <WH834> are in a city. <WH5892>
Indeed, <WH3588> there <WH369> is not a righteous <WH6662> man <WH120> on earth <WH776> who <WH834> [continually] does <WH6213> good <WH9185> and who never <WH3808> sins. <WH2398>
Also, <WH1571> do not take <WH5414> seriously <WH3820> all <WH3605> words <WH1697> which <WH834> are spoken, <WH1696> lest <WH3808> you hear <WH8085> your servant <WH5650> cursing <WH7043> you.
For you also <WH1571> have realized <WH3045> that you likewise <WH1571> have many <WH7227> times <WH6471> cursed <WH7043> others. <WH312>
I tested <WH5254> all <WH3605> this <WH2090> with wisdom, <WH2451> [and] I said, <WH559> "I will be wise, <WH2449>" but it was far <WH7350> from me.
What <WH4100> has been <WH1961> is remote <WH7350> and exceedingly <WH6013> mysterious. <WH6013> Who <WH4310> can discover <WH4672> it?

I directed <WH5437> my mind <WH3820> to know, <WH3045> to investigate, <WH8446> and to seek <WH1245> wisdom <WH2451> and an explanation, <WH2808> and to know <WH3045> the evil <WH7562> of folly <WH3689> and the foolishness <WH3689> of madness. <WH1947>

And I discovered <WH4672> more <WH4480> bitter <WH4751> than <WH4480> death <WH4194> the woman <WH802> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> is snares <WH9285> and nets, <WH2764> whose hands <WH3027> are chains. <WH612> One <WH2896> who <WH2896> is pleasing <WH2896> to God <WH430> will escape <WH4422> from her, but the sinner <WH2398> will be captured <WH3920> by her.
"Behold, <WH7200> I have discovered <WH4672> this, <WH2088>" says <WH559> the Preacher, <WH6953> "[adding] one <WH259> thing <WH259> to another <WH259> to find <WH4672> an explanation, <WH2808>

which <WH834> I am still <WH5750> seeking <WH1245> but have not found. <WH4672> I have found <WH4672> one <WH259> man <WH120> among <WH4480> a thousand, <WH505> but I have not found <WH4672> a woman <WH802> among all <WH3605> these. <WH428>
"Behold, <WH7200> I have found <WH4672> only <WH905> this, <WH2088> that God <WH430> made <WH6213> men <WH120> upright, <WH3477> but they have sought <WH1245> out many <WH7227> devices. <WH2810>"
